description: The party will feature the talent of Nando Aguiar, bringing all his energy and swing to make you dance until the early hours! To liven things up even more, we'll have the infectious sounds of DJ MB, who promises to get everyone dancing with his lively sets. And of course, there will be plenty of special guests, making this night even more unforgettable. Come relive the magic of Carnaval in a cozy atmosphere, with quality food and lots of fun! Don't miss out on this unmissable party.
